Name: Archer VR
About the game: Have you ever wanted to try yourself at archery? Have you ever dreamt of becoming a hero of the Middle Ages? In Archer, you are to fight hordes of orcs, goblins, and trolls attacking your fortress, and in the end - defeat the main boss! Hurry! Grab a bow and defend your castle against uninvited guests! Gameplay and features Take the bow… Aim… Shot… Kill. 3 different levels are waiting for you The more accurate you are – the better your results. Headshots increase damage level as far as bow pool force Move between shotzones to get the best position and dominate the battleground Use special arrows to stop the most dangerous enemies
